summary: I remember watching Sheen in Twilight and Underworld but it never clicked when they said he was playing in Good Omens. But I...
question: I remember watching Sheen in Twilight and Underworld but it never clicked when they said he was playing in Good Omens. But I never would’ve guessed that freaky vampire, snarly hot werewolf dude would play this cutie of an angel.
answer: Well, perhaps that’s why Neil originally though of him as Crowley, but since they’ve been friends he got to know him and realized Michael is a very loving person who is certainly capable of a wonderful Aziraphale portrayal :).

reblog.comment: Well, perhaps that’s why Neil originally though of him as Crowley, but since they’ve been friends he got to know him and realized Michael is a very loving person who is certainly capable of a wonderful Aziraphale portrayal :).

trail.content_raw: Well, perhaps that’s why Neil originally though of him as Crowley, but since they’ve been friends he got to know him and realized Michael is a very loving person who is certainly capable of a wonderful Aziraphale portrayal :).
trail.content: Well, perhaps that’s why Neil originally though of him as Crowley, but since they’ve been friends he got to know him and realized Michael is a very loving person who is certainly capable of a wonderful Aziraphale portrayal :).

tags: also don't believe everything you see on the internet :)
summary: Michael seems a generally good guy! I’m actually listening to David’s podcast with him right now. But I think it’s always...
question: Michael seems a generally good guy! I’m actually listening to David’s podcast with him right now. But I think it’s always important for fans to remember that actors are human like all of us and no one is perfect. If you recognize that I don’t think there’s anything about Michael that we know of that’d make learning more about him a problem.

reblog.comment: Very well said! :)

trail.content_raw: Very well said! :)
trail.content: Very well said! :)

summary: David Tennant says "We fell I love..." when talking about Good Omens. He then said "the human world" but in my head he meant...
body: David Tennant says “We fell I love…” when talking about Good Omens. He then said “the human world” but in my head he meant Cowley and Aziraphale. Never really shipped them until the series! So so good.
